effect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.
Discard an Energy card attached to Typhlosion and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
